price: "Gooftaan keenya qulqullaa'e; dhugumatti, nuti miidhaa hojjattoota taaneerra" jedhan.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
